job.name: HDFS

variable.name: INSTANCE_NAME
variable.description: The name of the service to be deployed.

variable.name: swarm_service_instance_id
variable.description: This variable must be set to the targeted Docker_Swarm service instance id.

job.description: Deploy a HDFS platform of nb_hdfs_datanodes datanodes. A Swarm service (Docker_Swarm) needs to be started first, and the swarm_service_instance_id variable must be set to the service instance id of this targeted Docker Swarm.

metadata.visualization:
get_resources_from_service_instance
 start_spark_master
 start_spark_slave
 update_service_instance
replicate
